messages.subject: Where Buzz lives was old timers ..now: BC unschoolers
messages.msgSnippet: ... Naww..... I wish!....I m way over here to the east in Southern Ontario. I m in Hamilton about 45 min west of Toronto and about 1 hr drive from Buffalo NY.
messages.messageBody:
Campbell & Wyman wrote:
> I think that Deb (Buzz) is from BC too. But I could be wrong. Hey
> buzz...are you there. ???
Naww..... I wish!....I'm way over here to the east in Southern Ontario.
I'm in Hamilton about 45 min west of Toronto and about 1 hr drive from
Buffalo NY.

Buzz (Debbie)
